name: Driver Hamster of Volvo Truck
description:
This is the game inspired by a video Volvo Trucks - The Hamster Stunt (Live Test) where Volvo trained a hamster to steer a truck by attracting it with a carrot. 

How to Play:

1. W/S to operate the truck

2. Attract the hamster using the carrot to steer the truck

3. R to restart 

You are welcome to show your score in the comment :) !
